projects.description: Cache remover extension for Google Chrome. It gathers all cookies stored by the current active website, displays them in a tree view and allows to remove any or all of them.
projects.title: Cookie Devourer

projects.description: Juego en primera persona en el que tienes que luchar contra el minotauro y encontrar la salida del laberinto.
projects.title: Laberinto del minotauro

projects.description: Website that highlights my experience and personal projects. It is localized to several languages.
projects.title: This website

projects.description: Relajante juego para la competición de videojuegos LEGO Ideas. Haz crecer diferentes tipos de cultivos y recógelos para ganar dinero.
projects.title: Granja LEGO

projects.description: Primer juego que hice para practicar mis nuevas habilidades adquiridas en Unity.
projects.title: Asteroides

projects.description: Game for the Ludum Dare 44 game jam, developed in group with some folks from the Baltimore Indie Game Developers Group. I did most of the programming and set up the scenes in Unity.
projects.title: Ludum Dare 44: Dinero Suelto

strings.Intro: I like to keep improving and learning new skills. I look for skills that are fun, useful and complementary to my job as a front-end software engineer. This is a list of projects that I have created in the last years during my free time to practice those skills.
